revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-822 |revision=A1 |series=AC1200 |asin=B071P3VB1L |newegg=N82E16833127595 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-AC43 |manuf_rev=A1 |availability=now |fcc_date=05/26/2015 |fcc_id=KA2IR822A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR822A1 |pcb_id=8WRGAC43.1A1G |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197DL |cpu1_cspeed=660 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M14D5121632A |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8812AR |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless AC1200 Dual Band Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/ac1200-wi-fi-router-dcs822/}} (US) {{•}} [http://www.dlinktw.com.tw/home/product?id=904&hid=18 Product page] (CN) {{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DIR-822-US}} "8WRGAC43.1A1G" and "WRGAC43" is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos. *[https://forum.archive.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=46606&p=13 ''Realtek SoC support in OpenWrt'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :D-Link DIR-822A1 H/W ver:C1 (P/N: CIR822LCA..C1) :FCC ID: KA2IR822A1 (WRGAC43S) • [https://www.dropbox.com/sh/9gg3jr8ptwex7qq/AAAC5eLWxGxpz7ETDND1BTIMa/archive?dl=0&subfolder_nav_tracking=1 PCB images] :• CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197DL - Lexra RLX5281 core (@660MHz) :• Flash: Macronix MX25L6406E - 64M-bit [x1/x2] (CMOS Serial) :• RAM: ESMT M14D5121632A - 8M x 16bit x 4 Banks (DDR2 SDRAM) :• WLAN 2.4GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8192ER - 802.11bgn 2T2R (PCIe) :• WLAN 5GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8812AR - 802.11ac/abgn 2T2R (PCIe) :• 20PT1024RX, 12PS6121A chips ===Serial=== Serial port pin (38400,8N1) :• 1 TX :• 2 GND :• 3 +3.3v :• 4 RX ===See also=== *[[List of D-Link Wireless Devices]] ==Images== ---- __NOTOC__
